::Cygnar::
    After speaking to Drill Bit he grabs some extra signal maskers.  He heads 
outside and finds Darkfate.  "Hello.  I'm afraid I don't remember having met 
you.  But if you're here to help in the battle take this."  He offers 
Darkfate a signal masker.  He opens a com to Drill Bit again.  "Sorry Drill 
Bit but you need a signal masker still, I think."
